title: Notes from “The Nuts and Bolts of OAuth 2.0”
description: The overview for Aaron Parecki’s Udemy's course: “The Nuts and Bolts of OAuth 2.0”. These notes cover everything from what is OAuth, to different authentication flows, token types, and many more OAuth topics.

title: First Mock Consulting Meeting At Pragmint
description: A reflection of my first mock consulting engagement during my Pragmint apprenticeship where I meet the client and discussed details for his upcoming tic tac toe tournament.

title: Handling Uncertainty
description: Uncertainty is a prevalent aspect of software delivery. Learning to navigate uncertainty is a critical part of being a reliable software craftsmen. This blog focuses on my apprenticeship's tic tac toe tournament project at Pragmint.

title: Setting Expectations
description: Where there is uncertainty, there are false assumptions. Gaining a clear understanding of the client's desires, preferences, and areas of uncertainty is essential for setting expectations.

title: Incremental Refactoring
description: Incremental refactoring is taking small bit size changes and verifying each change along the the way. This is a story of a time during my Pragmint apprenticeship where I did not make incremental changes.
